Number: K2415002547]. Fee. Retrieved 14 December 2008 |religion = Judaism
|website = [http://cantor.house.gov/ Rep. Eric
Cantor] [http://www.majorityleader.gov/ Eric Cantor Majority Leader] }} 'Eric
Ivan Cantor' (; born June 6, 1963) is the U.S. Representative for Virginia's 7th
congressional district, serving since 2001. A member of the Republican Party, he
became House Majority Leader when the 112th Congress convened on January 3,
2011. He previously served as House Minority Whip from 2009 to 2011.

His district includes most of the northern and western sections of Richmond,
along with most of Richmond's western suburbs and portions of the Shenandoah
Valley. Cantor is the highest-ranking Jewish member of Congress in its history.
